   16: -module(users_api_SUITE).
   17: -compile(export_all).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   20: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   21: 
   22: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Suite configuration
   24: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: all() ->
   26:     [{group, transaction},
   27:      {group, negative}].
   28: 
   29: groups() ->
   30:     [{transaction, [{repeat_until_any_fail, 10}], [user_transaction]},
   31:      {negative, [], [negative_calls]}
   32:     ].
   33: 
   34: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   35:     case is_external_auth() of
   36:         true ->
   37:             {skip, "users api not compatible with external authentication"};
   38:         false ->
   39:             [{riak_auth, is_riak_auth()} | katt_helper:init_per_suite(Config)]
   40:     end.
   41: 
   42: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   43:     katt_helper:end_per_suite(Config).
   44: 
   45: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   49:     ok.
   50: 
   51: init_per_testcase(_CaseName, Config) ->
   52:     Config.
   53: 
   54: end_per_testcase(_CaseName, _Config) ->
   55:     ok.
   56: 
   57: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   58: %% users_api tests
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: user_transaction(Config) ->
   61:     Params = [{host, ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain)},
   62:               {username, "http_guy"}],
   63:     Result = katt_helper:run(user_transaction, Config, Params),
   64:     Vars = element(4, Result),
   65: 
   66:     UserCount1 = proplists:get_value("user_count_1", Vars),
   67:     UserCount2 = proplists:get_value("user_count_2", Vars),
   68:     ?assertEqual(UserCount1+1, UserCount2),
   69:     wait_for_user_removal(proplists:get_value(riak_auth, Config)).
   70: 
   71: negative_calls(Config) ->
   72:     Params = [{host, ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain)}],
   73:     katt_helper:run(user_negative, Config, Params).
   74: 
   75: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   76: %% internal functions
   77: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   78: is_external_auth() ->
   79:     lists:member(ejabberd_auth_external, auth_modules()).
   80: 
   81: is_riak_auth() ->
   82:     lists:member(ejabberd_auth_riak, auth_modules()).
   83: 
   84: auth_modules() ->
   85:     Hosts = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [hosts]),
   86:     lists:flatmap(
   87:       fun(Host) ->
   88:               escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth, auth_modules, [Host])
   89:       end, Hosts).
   90: 
   91: wait_for_user_removal(false) ->
   92:     ok;
   93: wait_for_user_removal(_) ->
   94:     do_wait_for_user_removal(10).
   95: 
   96: do_wait_for_user_removal(0) ->
   97:     ok;
   98: do_wait_for_user_removal(N) ->
   99:     Domain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  100:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_auth_riak, get_vh_registered_users_number, [Domain]) of
  101:         0 ->
  102:             ok;
  103:         _ ->
  104:             timer:sleep(500),
  105:             do_wait_for_user_removal(N-1)
  106:     end.
